title: How to quit from Alpha
body: So .... I want to quit from the alpha client now which mean i don't want to be a testers any more. But I did not find out where I could quit (like how to quit) and  I was also worried that would affect my original account. So just want to ask where you can quit  from Alpha testers? Is deleting the alpha client is working? By the way if i quit the alpha tester will you guys take away my original account too?

replies.body:
You can quit any time, without any type of consequence. All you have to do is to not open the client update and open only the legacy client.

You might uninstall the alpha also and both the legacy client and your account will keep working as usual.
